30 October 2023

JS Testing Space

by 

%%js

//For loop with extractable iterative i which increases by 1 each time
/*
Python equivalent:
for i in range(5):
    print(i)

*/

for (let i = 0; i < 5; i++){
    console.log(i)
}

<IPython.core.display.Javascript object>
